;

;"Goodbye Lover" reached its third season, and producer Liu Le finally realized his dream when he proposed the plan - bringing guests with him Entered the Civil Affairs Bureau for a day of filming.

;

;The service hall of the Aheqi County Civil Affairs Bureau is less than 200 square meters, and marriages and divorces are completed here. Three pairs of guests who didn't know whether they would get divorced witnessed the union of several local couples and the separation of families.

;

;Liu Le used to be a social news reporter and worked in the Civil Affairs Bureau. After deciding to make "Goodbye Lover", she asked the team to squat in front of the Civil Affairs Bureau. Although it was fruitless, the members all faced the original shock. They couldn't say anything at the moment. After returning, everyone had ups and downs. "I want to shoot joys and sorrows all in the same place, and human feelings are not the same. When you made the promise, did you ever think about separation? When you separated, did you remember the promise?" Liu Le said.

;

;In 2021, the first season of the reality show "Goodbye Love", which is closely related to "divorce", will be launched. In the program, three pairs of guests who have problems in their marriages went on an 18-day trip to review the beauty of love, analyze marriage problems, and find answers to relationships. The program presents the trivial and difficult-to-discern life in public, and explores the details and deep conflicts of marriage, which resonates with the audience. In the autumn of 2023, the third season of "Goodbye Lover" will be broadcast. Fu Seoul and Lao Liu, Ji Huanbo and Wang Shiqing, Wang Sleepy and Zhang Shuosheng are three lovers who "look beautiful" to outsiders, exposing the illusion, facing their respective dilemmas, and once again Generate discussions about intimacy.

;

;Liu Le, the core producer and chief director of this show, has been a social news reporter for four years and the director of "Happy Camp" for ten years. In the past three years, in addition to the "Goodbye Lover" series, her His other works include "The Delayed Departure of Spring" - also related to divorce. She has been paying attention to emotional topics for a long time. She liked to post emotional jokes on the Internet from time to time many years ago. She has written most of the program copywriting for "Goodbye Lover" and "Spring Departs Again".

;

;"Goodbye Lover" is the summary of Liu Le's more than ten years of experience in the industry, which combines the touch and sensitivity of a traditional journalist, the entertainment and dexterity of a variety show director, and the sharpness and sharpness of an emotional blogger. As a single woman, she has pushed many married people to take a step forward in their exploration of marriage and intimacy.

;

;After the show was broadcast, Liu Le received more concern and support than expected. Some colleagues even wanted to get married after reading it. Hu Yanbin, a guest in the observation room, told her: "If parting is not so terrible, and we still have such deep care for each other, such good wishes, and such a decent separation, then I would also long for marriage."

;

;《 After the recording of the third season of "Goodbye Lover" ended, Liu Le accepted an exclusive interview with us and talked about the joys and sorrows related to the show in the past three seasons and the subtleties of human nature she has explored.

;

;Can't we get a divorce without quarreling?

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;"Goodbye Lover" reaches its third season and is still touching What's yours? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;What shocked me the most this season was the sense of blamelessness between Seoul and Lao Liu. Before coming to Seoul, tell me, is it okay if I don’t quarrel? I said that whoever said "Goodbye Lover" would quarrel, and if there is no quarrel, there will be no quarrel. ;

;

;When we went to the Civil Affairs Bureau, the director asked why we couldn’t survive. What happened? Are you not going home? Was it drinking? Did he hit you? He has a lot of "clinical experiment" experience, and the questions he raised are very valuable. When we hear about other people’s divorce in our daily lives, we also ask what questions there are. If he said that there was no problem, why would he divorce? Good days.

;

;The inertial thinking of many people is that I have to have an affair, have a violent family, and have to defraud me of money before I can get divorced. no. So our main concept this season is dull pain and slow growth. I can't tell you exactly what it is.

;

;When the first few episodes were aired, you may have thought that you were complaining for no reason, that you were forcing yourself to express your sorrow, and that you just made up a set of words just to be on the show. Like Seoul, in the first half and second half of the broadcast, I read some public accounts and wrote from the beginning that Fu Seoul must be here to make money, and she will definitely not get divorced. After a few episodes, another public account wrote that Fu Seoul must be here to make money, because she had already planned to leave.

;

;How people will recognize her is also the most difficult part to convince Seoul. Everyone will doubt whether she is motivated by utilitarianism. I told her, if you are willing to face your real dilemma, come. This sound will never dissipate. The most important point for persuading her is that she has real emotional demands. The marriage of more than ten years has truly taken root in her heart.

;

;I have known her for several years. When I was still in "Happy Camp", she came to be my guest. She said that I am particularly envious of your state, a state where you can fall in love at any time. I said, did you encounter any confusion in your marriage? Chatted with her a bit. After doing "Goodbye Lover", she often sent me some comments after watching the first two seasons. I felt that what she said actually brought her own personality.

;

;Seoul is very defensive. She will protect herself, but she wants to speak, but she won’t speak very thoroughly. She looks happy and cheerful, but there must be a lot of devastation in her heart buried under the surface of her wanting to make everyone happy, and I really want to dig this thing out. I mentioned it to her after the second season ended, and there must have been a process of persuasion. I told her that as long as you make up your mind, nothing will happen. The problem is a problem, but it can be solved.

;

;My judgment is that she will face it sooner or later. I am not saying that she must come on the show, but she has many knots in her heart that cannot be relieved by chatting with friends. On the one hand, she wants to seek change, and on the other hand, she also longs to be understood by more people. She still has the "old script" part to a large extent. I have been married for more than ten years and no one has made any mistakes. We have all tried our best. Why can't we live well? If so, can we choose to separate? I feel that she and Lao Liu are both in a trapped state. She can't really reconcile this matter, so much so that she is willing to go on a show to reveal everything to everyone. The real situation is like this, then I Can it be understood? She is so eager to be understood. She is pioneering and conservative, active and passive. She is a very charming contradiction.

;

;I hope that one day she can accept her real difficulties and not move forcefully towards another life. This may be easier, but Seoul is not an easy person.

;

;;

;

;In the third season of "Goodbye Lover", six guests celebrated the 14th wedding anniversary of Fu Seoul and Liu Yi;;

;

;Don’t separate easily, and don’t drag it out to death

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;How did you find the other two pairs of guests? ;

;

;;Liu Le:;;The other two pairs signed up by themselves. Wang Shiqing signed up for the second season, but when I talked to her at the time, there were no such big conflicts as this season. This year, I feel much more profound. After we reopened from the closed state last year, we entered a dynamic that will bring many severe impacts. If the relationship itself is good, this dynamic has the potential to make you even better. If it is not good in the first place, it will fall apart faster. ;

;

;Wang Shiqing has more job opportunities, and she obviously feels that she is stronger. Her connections and feedback from society have become extremely concrete. She really feels like "I am flying high." ". As for the person who wanted to hold me back, his actions became more obvious.

;

;Wang Sleeping signed up after the second season. At that time, the many quarrels between Zhang Wanting and Song Ningfeng reminded her of herself. She felt that she also liked to curse people and was unhappy, so she filled out the registration form. When I first looked at their materials, I didn’t see as many problems as those presented in the show. In the first round of contact, many directors judged them to be trivial and the problems were too trivial. They didn’t seem to be worth analyzing in daily life, not so thought-provoking, and not so promising. Expansion space, etc.

;

;Is it possible that trivial things are really worth extending? Could the program team be trapped by the so-called desire to pursue quality? Is it that when we present intimate relationships, we are too obsessed with those things that are invisible, intangible, and unclear, while those things that can be clearly seen, touched, grasped, and can be directly judged as right or wrong? Are we all excluded?

;

;Let's reflect on it. In the first season, Zhu Yaqiong expressed a lot of feelings, but in the end what people remember is that one-minute hug. Or implement it on specific events. Specific events can give people something to grasp, reflect on whether they have behaved like this, and better establish a comparative coordinate system, so we set them.

;

; Many people say that "Goodbye Lover" is to rely on fierce quarrels to attract attention. No, the show group does not want to be endless. That thing makes people despair and suffocate. But since it’s a reality show, we can’t interfere once they start. It is impossible for us to go up and tell them to stop quarreling and make peace with me quickly. It is even less possible for us to tell them that you two can start quarreling now. This is ridiculous. All we can do is record it truthfully.

;

;What topics will the flying guests bring when they join, and what new projects can they do? We can invisiblely implant these into the journey to trigger changes in them. The others exploded without even knowing what game they would be in, and any one sentence made him angry.

;

;Look, Zhang Shuo sent a WeChat message to the best man at that time ; (In the first issue, Wang Sleepy and Zhang Shuo had a dispute over their marriage. They had a quarrel, and the two broke up. Later, they quarreled over other things. At this time, Zhang Shuo sent a WeChat message to the best man to try to ease the conflict with Sui Suo. His most real feeling at that moment was that it was a good thing to do. , it can definitely be undone: She was angry with me because of other things, and I immediately had to do something to make up for it. But precisely because he did these things, the audience intuitively felt that his model was to tear down the east wall to repair the west wall, and the demolition was not good, and the repair was not good, and the whole person was very perfunctory. Is this perfunctory social norm? yes. So it resonated the most. A quarrel can only make people watch the fun, but what can make everyone stay after the fun is the pain behind the quarrel. It’s a point of empathy.

;

;I think Zhang Shuo still represents a very common phenomenon: I don’t need to achieve 100 points in this matter, I always control my efforts, just achieve 10 points, 20 points That's it, lay flat everywhere, whether it's work, socializing or love for him. Huang Zhizhong is right, he is very stingy with his energy. Now that I have paid 10 points of energy, if you don’t recognize the value of my 10 points, I will not be happy. Is this selfish? of course.

;

;Because of the hot search for "Mirror of Society" posted by Zhang Shuo, I think the audience can also very intuitively feel how powerless such an emotional model is for contemporary young people. Why do so many people not want to fall in love? Everyone said that I don't need to be so full, if love is not deeply loved.

;

;In fact, Zhang Shuo has many advantages. We are angry at him, but we cannot hate him. He is indeed a very kind-hearted child who is very considerate of the emotions around him. But why is this the pattern in intimate relationships? It’s been explored in the program, and it’s also being talked about in the observation room. (One of the reasons may be) People crave positive feedback, which is a physiological mechanism. If I make a mistake, do I want to get some advice instead of being asked if I am wrong? No one likes to be whipped all the time. After being whipped, I may do worse. This is a behavioral mechanism.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;There are many words "Sleep, sleep and run" in the program barrage. No one can understand why the two of them are still together. ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;I think the audience has directly seen a presentation, and they will think that since this is the case, why don't they break up? But as far as Suisie is concerned, this person is my first love. We have been together for 10 years. He used to be very good to me. It is not easy to decide to break up. When encountering problems, I must first think about how to solve them. What has changed? Can I change it? ;

;

;People must have hope, this is a very positive thing. Most people in the past went to the other extreme. No matter how hard, how tired, how many grievances we suffered, we had to live this life and never get divorced. Now the new trend is: if something is slightly wrong, say goodbye immediately.

;

;"Goodbye Lover" has always wanted to find a middle balance, neither to separate easily nor to drag it out to death. We hope to have the ability to leave and repair. Maybe this is a healthier love.

;

;I believe that for Wang Sleepy, when she decided to appear on the show, she just wanted to give the relationship one last chance. If it works out well, she will continue it, and if it doesn't, she will break up. In this process, every wavering, anger, and softening of her heart is extremely sincere. She is trying to re-recognize this person.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;After the program was broadcast, Zhang Shuo’s behavior caused a lot of controversy controversy. What was his feedback? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;He is in pain. I feel like my self has been completely shattered and completely denied. During the broadcast, he would come to discuss with us from time to time, basically introspection, which I found very difficult. No one can really quickly admit that they are a terrible person. This is a cruel thing and takes time, but we see that Zhang Shuo has been working hard. He still has an exploratory attitude. ;

;

;Zhang Shuo is considered a very sunny person in the show, and he is quite able to have fun for himself. Whether these public opinions are correct or not, they have a great impact on him. He was in pain, but he had to admit that some of the comments might be quite reasonable. Just like when a person wants to digest a knife, a knife is already in the flesh. It is cutting my tumor. I scream in pain, but I have to endure it.

;

;;

;

;"Goodbye Lover" Season 3 guests Wang Sleepy (left) and Zhang Shuo;;

; < p>; ; Southern Character Weekly: ; ; The strong men's weak comments on this season, this is your intention For that? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;It was not intentional. Usually we don’t save materials just because they have something in common. We discover that we can come up with something during the process of saving. The title of the first issue, "Looks Beautiful," is the commonality we picked out. The three couples were all collected separately. From the massive amount of material about each of them, we came up with the point that our marriage may look good to outsiders, but in fact it is not. ;

;

;As for whether women are strong and men are weak, I think we are just providing a discussion angle. Maybe everyone will come to this conclusion after reading it. In fact, none of these three couples are absolutely strong women, and they also have weaknesses. So we discussed what is strong, is it economic strength? If there is only one dimension, it can be considered that the three pairs are all strong women and weak men. But what about the right to speak? What about the need to be loved? What about the sense of presence in marriage? What about ease and comfort? Who is the emotional superior? Returning to these dimensions, they may not be strong.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You just said that you hope this program will be a platform for exploration. This is The original intention of the show? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;I have this direction only by doing it. Every time we meet a couple and they come to our show, their behavior may be somewhat beyond the threshold: too manipulative, too insecure, too patient, etc. ;

;

;For all parts that exceed the threshold, we hope to make everyone realize that this is a bit beyond the limit and you can come back. We strive to stand in a safer area. But sometimes, when some problems occur, I hope that everyone will not think that this matter is such a big deal.

;

;Now NPD;(narcissistic personality disorder);, gaslighting;(a means of psychological manipulation);, borderline personality and other terms often appear. When people encounter something, they may immediately make a conclusion. So what are the real meanings of these words? What is the definition of professional? Will there be any overkill?

;

;I have also been thinking about this question since the second season. Can we conclude that this person is a lunatic once his behavior exceeds our daily cognition? Or once we make a judgment on a person, will everything he says next be untrustworthy? I don't think so. Teacher Guo ;(Guo Keyu); said in the first season: "People have too many sides." I particularly agree with this sentence. . There are all kinds of people, including crazy, depressed, high-value, and low-value people. People themselves are complex and imperfect animals, but their desire to be loved is true. Everyone is equal in love and everyone is equal in intimate relationships. This is why "Goodbye Lover" does not strictly distinguish between celebrities and amateurs. We put them all in one field for discussion.

;

;I read a review that said "Goodbye Lover" is like untying a Luban lock, making those that are not tight enough buckle tighter and letting those that are on the verge of falling apart fall to the ground smoothly, rather than violently dismantling or never untying them. Open, let’s find a final ending for all the shaky Luban Locks. I agree.

;

;No more shame when talking about intimate relationships

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;How did you come up with the idea of ​​doing such a show at that time? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;From an industry perspective, there was a vacancy in the divorce track. At that time, all major platforms were exploring divorce IP. In the existing domestic and foreign divorce IP, some problems have not been really solved. For example, what is the appeal? If you are divorced and you are put on a trip together, do you have any appeal? Or is this the appeal of a program? Is it a request to watch? If the character has no appeal, what is presented may be very empty and ungrounded. ;

;

;The divorce cooling-off period is the key to why I think of this IP. It can be used as an appeal. The first people I target are couples who have entered a cooling-off period. We only have 30 days to see if we can get this order. In marriage, everyone may have thought about divorce countless times. Why? What actions did you take after thinking about it? Repair it, or ignore it? ...There are a lot of character dynamics that can be told here, and because the divorce has not really been completed, we still have room to explore. The guests in the third season should be said to be the most suitable for my earliest plan, and they are not finished yet.

;

;The first two seasons are also based on this idea. The people we choose are not cold at least in our judgment. If they are cold, there will be no stories to tell. It is not good to divorce for too long, preferably within two or three years. The two people still have some contact from time to time, and some people have even proposed getting back together, etc. There are still ties, demands, and some confusions.

;

;In daily life, I see other people's affairs very clearly, but I can always put off my own affairs, and maybe they will get better again. Without a huge incident, it is not easy for people to start a knife in a relatively smooth and ups and downs. We are not aware of the deep-seated rifts. How can we have the strength to detect this? Who would take an X-ray to illuminate their emotions? Many people do it either out of fear, laziness or avoidance. That's almost enough. Why do you keep saying this? It's so pretentious. This is especially common among men in relationships. Is there anything to discuss? I'm going out for a drink. I have many colleagues and the company has many things going on.

;

;Communication and communication are often a matter of two people, not a unilateral choice. If I tell others, I want to talk to my lover about the problems in our eight-year marriage, but He doesn't talk to me properly, so if I want to divorce him, others may say you are sick. But in the context of "Goodbye Lover", no matter how small the issue is, it will be taken seriously, and everyone will discuss it. So how do you talk about this, and whether you should divorce your marriage.

;

;"Goodbye Lover" focuses on many issues in intimate relationships. I took a magnifying glass to this area, and everyone said that your issue seems to be really worthy of attention.

;

;This is at least a starting point for people who are stuck in marriage, people who want to get married, and people who want to talk about these things but are embarrassed. I am no longer ashamed, I want to talk to you today. Chat, let’s communicate your neglect of me. I don’t think it’s very abrupt, I don’t feel ashamed, it’s healthy, it’s also a kind of courage, and it’s also a kind of bravery.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Why do most of the travel destinations chosen have beautiful scenery, but Somewhere relatively off the beaten track? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;Choose these places because they look good. The original and natural beauty is very important. People should get in touch with nature when they are confused, but few people do this. The place we chose is because we hope to stay there for a long time, making it very difficult for them and allowing them to feel the vastness of the world and the insignificance of human beings. This is an intuitive psychological suggestion. ;

;

;Nature still has a strong healing effect. We strive to create a high-purity (shooting) environment so that they can safely enter deep water areas to discuss. This process is not easy, the beautiful scenery is a short-term comfort, no matter what, they are a very, very brave group of people.

;

;;

;

;"Goodbye Lover" Season 2;;

;

;Praise to love, praise romance

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You have no marriage experience, and the sweetness and pain of marriage in daily life are very small. And really, how do you grasp these subtleties in a divorce show? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;I have to understand why he did this at this moment. Why does he feel this way? Why make such a judgment? It’s certainly not 100% empathetic, but in this process, what are the questions worth asking? These can be developed through training, which is asking questions about intuition. ;

;

;I think it is a good thing that I have never been married. I have contacted some colleagues, and I heard that I was going to do this subject, and I especially wanted to chat with me. After talking with me, I felt that everyone was too focused on themselves, and it was easy to draw conclusions, "What is marriage?" With sentences like this, I I heard a lot during that time, and they were all very different. The only thing they had in common was that they all believed in their own judgment in marriage. At this time, I clear my mind. I don’t listen to anyone’s words. I only present the words of all of you as a sample. The sample can have many cores for the audience to summarize on their own.

;

; If I already have a marriage, I dare not guarantee that I will say that this does not exist, because I did not encounter this situation in my marriage. This is too ridiculous and cut him. Not having an open mind is very dangerous.

;

;Love must come in all kinds of different forms. When I was doing the show, I would also look back on my past relationships and realize that I had made mistakes of one kind or another. This is a very interesting thing. You can see it clearly in others. When it comes to yourself, who is a perfect partner? So looking back at myself, I feel that love is a long-term lesson.

;

;I prefer that my views on emotions come from real emotions rather than from the show. I hope "Goodbye Lover" is an auxiliary, it should not be the main course. You have to feel the specific people and real people, not some truths. Fu Seoer is already very reasonable, and Wang Sleepy is also very reasonable, but why are they still not so happy?

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;The program has progressed to this point, and the audience has also experienced a lot of laughter. . But laughter cannot offset the real pain in a marriage. What do you think the meaning of "laughing" is? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;Pain is pain. If pain is downward, laughter is upward. It may increase a little energy to resist pain, or allow people to see the full picture of pain more clearly. Responding to pain with a smile is art. As Mu Xin said, a person who comes out of sadness with grace is an artist. This smile is a kind of generous. ;

;

;;

;

;"Goodbye Lover" Season 1;;

;

;;South People Weekly:;;How did you come up with the program's slogan "Goodbye is easy, goodbye is hard"? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;At that time, I felt that young people gave up too easily. I used to like to persuade people to get sober, but when more and more people were saying that it was no big deal to get sober and give up, I realized that this might be a new trend. When we discussed it, Talk about bringing together these people who want to break up. Is the act of "Let's talk again" a bit old-fashioned and inconsistent with the current situation of young people: "I always want to find new people"? That's why we say goodbye is easy or hard, and we think of "goodbye" and "goodbye", which in English are "see you" and "see you again". ;

;

;Modern people are too easy to see the flaws of others. They cannot enter the deep water area and always swim in the shallow water area. No matter how many people they come into contact with, they will all be the same after a few months, and they will miss the conversation very much. When we have been in love for several years, it seems that people receive different nourishment at that time. Nowadays, short videos are teaching you, "You should be wary if he does this", "If he doesn't say this, he doesn't love you"... This kind of dismantling is very rough. There are still many unattributable parts in relationships. It would be a pity if everyone is influenced by these crude logics and thinks that we can just play on the water.

;

;In an era when you can get a lot of happiness without falling in love, it is an extremely romantic thing to fall in love. I hope I can sing (this kind of love and romance). In the past, people may have had many practical needs when getting married. I needed someone to face life with me. But now, it seems that mobile phones have solved everything. Even if we don’t fall in love or get married, everyone can live quite well. In such a situation, it is such a romantic thing to find intimacy.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Do you think people still need to seek intimacy in this situation? What is the reason? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;Because it is really good. If you have been to that mountain, you will know that the scenery there is very good, but the mountain climbing The process is very tiring. I hope you won’t stop climbing just because you are tired. Don’t think that the most fun is on the ground. The ground is safe, relaxed, comfortable, and ok, but you don’t. I’ve been up there, so I don’t care about the scenery on the mountain. "Goodbye Lover" shows everyone the rugged mountain road, but everyone can still climb their own mountain. Those who work hard will gain more scenery, this must be the case. ;

; Hu Jinglin, the new Party Secretary of the State Administration of Taxation. Picture source: The official website of the Ministry of Finance

;

;The official website of the State Administration of Taxation announced that on the morning of November 28, 2023, relevant responsible comrades from the Organization Department of the Central Committee attended the meeting of leading cadres of the State Administration of Taxation and announced the central government’s decision: Comrade Hu Jinglin will be appointed as the national Secretary of the Party Committee of the State Administration of Taxation, Comrade Wang Jun is removed from his position as Secretary of the Party Committee of the State Administration of Taxation.

;

;Before taking over as Secretary of the Party Committee of the State Administration of Taxation, Hu Jinglin was Secretary of the Party Committee and Director of the National Medical Security Administration.

;

;Served in the Ministry of Finance for 20 years

;

;According to the official website of the State Council Information Office, Hu Jinglin was born in 1964 in Shexian County, Anhui Province. He graduated from Renmin University of China and received a doctorate in economics.

;

;Since 1992, Hu Jinglin has worked in the State-owned Assets Administration Bureau as deputy director of the Policy, Regulations and Judicial Regulations Division. According to the "Historical Dictionary Series of the Communist Party of China", in order to straighten out the relationship between state-owned assets and establish and improve the state-owned assets management system in the process of reform and opening up, in November 1988, the state established the State-owned Assets Administration Bureau.

;

;According to information from the Chinese Government website, in 1994, the State-owned Assets Administration became a national bureau (deputy ministerial level) managed by the Ministry of Finance. Its main task is to comprehensively manage state-owned assets within and outside the People's Republic of China.

;

;In March 1998, the State-owned Assets Administration Bureau was officially abolished. In the same year, the Large Enterprise Working Committee of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was formally established. During this period, the management structure of state-owned enterprises changed several times until the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council was established in 2003.

;

;At the time of the organizational reform in 1998, Hu Jinglin entered the Property Appraisal Department of the Ministry of Finance, and then served as Director of the Economic Construction Department of the Ministry of Finance, Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Finance, and Spokesperson of the Ministry of Finance.

;

; According to the official website of the State Council Information Office, Hu Jinglin has long been engaged in state-owned enterprise reform and macroeconomic theoretical research and practical work. He has rich work experience and profound theoretical foundation. He has participated in a number of major reforms of financial and industrial management systems and He is engaged in research on important macroeconomic policies and has authored (translated) many works such as "State-owned Enterprise Reform and Approaches", "Financial Asset Assessment", and "U.S. Federal Government Budget".

;

;In 2009, Hu Jinglin served as Assistant Minister of Finance and member of the Party Leadership Group. Five years later, he was promoted to deputy minister of finance.

;

;According to The Paper, when he was promoted to Vice Minister of Finance, Hu Jinglin was in charge of the General Office, Department of Agriculture, National Agricultural Comprehensive Development Office, Bureau of Retired Cadres, Information Network Center, and China Finance and Taxation Museum, assisting then Minister of Finance Lou Jiwei is in charge of the Office of the State Council’s Comprehensive Rural Reform Working Group.

;

;During his tenure at the Ministry of Finance, Hu Jinglin repeatedly emphasized the importance of budget management.

;

;In 2015, Hu Jinglin emphasized at the National Financial, Administrative, Political and Legal Work Conference that as far as the budget is concerned, it is necessary to enhance the legality and binding force of the budget and how to solve the problems of inaccurate budget preparation at the beginning of the year and mid-year budget. To deal with the problems of frequent adjustments and excessive budget balances at the end of the year, "we need to work with departments to establish the concept of 'budget is law'."

;

;"Never let the medical insurance fund become 'Tang Monk Meat'"

;

;After four years as Deputy Minister of Finance, Hu Jinglin was transferred to the National Medical Security Administration.

;

;In March 2018, the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress voted to adopt a decision on the institutional reform plan of the State Council, establishing the National Medical Security Administration of the People's Republic of China (deputy ministerial level) and becoming an agency directly under the State Council. Hu Jinglin became the first director.

;

;The institutional reform plan of the State Council at that time proposed that the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security’s basic medical insurance and maternity insurance responsibilities for urban employees and urban residents, the National Health and Family Planning Commission’s new rural cooperative medical responsibilities, and the national The National Development and Reform Commission's drug and medical service price management responsibilities and the Ministry of Civil Affairs' medical assistance responsibilities were integrated to form the National Medical Security Administration.

;

;In the past few years, during his tenure, Hu Jinglin actively promoted the solution of problems such as difficulty and high cost of medication for ordinary people.

;

;In March 2019, during the National Two Sessions, Hu Jinglin said in an interview at the "Ministerial Channel" that more life-saving and emergency medicines should be included in medical insurance by optimizing the directory structure to further alleviate and alleviate the epidemic. It is difficult for the people to use medicine and it is expensive.

;

;At the State Council Information Office press conference in May 2023, Hu Jinglin introduced that in the past five years, the National Medical Insurance Administration has accelerated the pace of medical insurance negotiations and promoted a large number of exclusive drugs such as camrelizumab and nosinaxin sodium. A variety of anti-cancer drugs and drugs for rare diseases are included in medical insurance at appropriate prices, and after reimbursement, the cumulative burden on patients has been reduced by more than 500 billion yuan.

;

;In 2019, the official website of the National Medical Insurance Administration published an article written by Hu Jinglin, stating that the next step is to strengthen the management of medical insurance funds, continue to carry out in-depth special operations against fraudulent insurance, and "look back" on some provinces Conduct random inspections and reviews of work. In addition, give full play to the power of the reporting reward system and establish a reporting clue supervision and feedback mechanism.

;

;"Make good use of the agreement management system. Medical institutions whose agreements have been terminated shall not be included in the medical insurance designated areas within 3 years. Build a long-term mechanism for fund supervision and ;;;Never let the medical insurance fund Become the new 'Tang Seng meat' ;. "Hu Jinglin introduced.

;

;At the above-mentioned press conference of the State Council Information Office, Hu Jinglin said that medical insurance funds are "life-saving money" for the people. The National Medical Insurance Administration has always regarded strengthening the supervision of medical insurance funds and maintaining fund security as its top priority, and severely cracked down on various forms of fraud. Such illegal use of medical insurance funds.

;

;"In the past five years, the total annual revenue of the basic medical insurance fund (including maternity insurance) has increased from 2.14 trillion yuan to 3.09 trillion yuan, and the total annual expenditure has increased from 1.78 trillion yuan to 2.46 trillion yuan. The fund is running smoothly and has a balance," Hu Jinglin said.

;

;Wang Jun has been the director of the State Administration of Taxation for ten years

;

;The Chinese government website shows that Wang Jun, the current director of the State Administration of Taxation, was born in 1958. He graduated from Peking University and received a doctorate in law.

;

;Wang Jun served in the Ministry of Finance from 1987 to 2013. In March 2013, Wang Jun, then deputy secretary of the Party Leadership Group and deputy minister of the Ministry of Finance, was promoted to secretary of the Party Leadership Group and director of the State Administration of Taxation.

;

;;

;

;In 2023, Wang Jun, Director of the State Administration of Taxation, and The head of Qatar’s General Tax Authority held talks. Image source: The official website of the State Administration of Taxation

;

;At the end of 1993, the State Council issued a document stating that in order to adapt to the national tax work, the organizational specifications of the State Administration of Taxation would be adjusted from the deputy ministerial level to the ministerial level. In January 1994, China began to implement the reform of the fiscal and taxation system with the tax-sharing system as the core, which significantly increased the central fiscal revenue.

;

;Since the reform of the tax-sharing system, the State Administration of Taxation has successively had five directors, namely Liu Zhongli, Jin Renqing, Xie Xuren, Xiao Jie, and Wang Jun. Among them, Wang Jun has served the longest.

;

;All five of them have worked in the Ministry of Finance, and four of them have served as Ministers of Finance.

;

;Liu Zhongli served as Minister of Finance and concurrently Director of the State Administration of Taxation from 1992 to 1998. Jin Renqing, Xie Xuren, and Xiao Jie all served as Ministers of Finance after serving as Directors of the State Administration of Taxation.

;

;As of now, Wang Jun has served as the director of the State Administration of Taxation for ten years and is 65 years old. In March 2023, Wang Jun was elected as the Standing Committee of the Fourteenth National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

;

;Looking back at the resumes of Wang Jun and Hu Jinglin, they have worked together in the Ministry of Finance for more than ten years, and both have served as director of the General Office of the Ministry of Finance, spokesperson, assistant minister, deputy minister, etc.

;

;In the ten years since Wang Jun served as director of the State Administration of Taxation, China's tax system reform has continued to deepen, including a series of actions such as replacing business tax with VAT, individual tax reform, merging state and local taxes, and tax and fee reductions.

;

;Starting from October 2018, the "threshold" for personal income tax will be increased from 3,500 yuan/month to 5,000 yuan/month.

;

;Five months later, Wang Jun said at the "Ministerial Channel" of the National Two Sessions that the personal income tax reform will bring 100% tax reduction to the working class, and about 80 million of them will no longer have to pay a tax. Taxes will be reduced by more than 70% for about 65 million people.

;

;In the same year, the First Session of the Thirteenth National People's Congress passed the institutional reform plan of the State Council. The State Council will reform the national and local tax collection and administration systems, merge the national and local tax agencies at the provincial and sub-provincial levels, and specifically bear the responsibilities of various taxation agencies within its jurisdiction. Responsibilities such as tax and non-tax revenue collection and management.

;

;The tax-sharing system reform in 1994 established two sets of tax collection and management systems: national tax and local tax. After 24 years of operation, the state and local taxes were merged and a new tax collection and administration system was established.

;

;As for the effects of tax cuts and fee reductions, the 2023 State Council Government Work Report concluded, “In the past five years, a cumulative tax reduction of 5.4 trillion yuan and a fee reduction of 2.8 trillion yuan have been achieved.”
